thread.title: Horrified TripAdvisor reviews reveal ‘horror film’ hotel where ‘blood smeared on mattress, paint peeling off the walls and filthy windows
thread.title_full: Horrified TripAdvisor reviews reveal ‘horror film’ hotel where ‘blood smeared on mattress, paint peeling off the walls and filthy windows

author: gbirchall
title: Horrified TripAdvisor reviews reveal ‘horror film’ hotel where ‘blood smeared on mattress, paint peeling off the walls and filthy windows
text:
Opinion 'WORST HOTEL EVER' Horrified TripAdvisor reviews reveal ‘horror film’ hotel where ‘blood smeared on mattress, paint peeling off the walls and filthy windows 
The Scarisbrick Hotel in Southport has received a deluge of scathing assessments on the site with a staggering 661 "terrible" reviews By GUY BIRCHALL
